snippet: The baseball commissioner said he would review Miami’s trade of top talent for Toronto prospects, but he noted that “clubs have to make their own decisions.”
abstract: MLB commissioner Bud Selig says he will review Miami Marlins trade of top talent for Toronto Blue Jays prospects, but gives no indication that he will block the deal.
lead_paragraph: The baseball commissioner said he would review Miami’s trade of top talent for Toronto prospects, but he noted that “clubs have to make their own decisions.”

headline.seo: Bud Selig Studying Marlins-Blue Jays Deal
headline.main: Reviewing Marlins Deal, Selig Expresses Caution
headline.print_headline: Reviewing Marlins Deal, Selig Expresses Caution
